website_summaries.verdict: This 5-ounce cleanser is high-end, doing an impressive job clearing pores and removing oil while acting as both a cleanser and a mask.
pros: Gentle enough on skin to be used every day as either a scrubbing cleanser or a mask
Particularly useful for ridding skin of excess oil
Does not possess an overpowering scent
cons: Face wash does not lather well

customer_reviews.title: Totally dissatisfied. Be cautious if you have sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this product to work so bad, but unfortunately, it caused more irritation to my skin. I used this product for five weeks, once a day, at night. I have sensitive and oily skin, so I proceeded with caution. Gradually, I had new pimples almost after every use, and my skin didn't look any better. Maybe in the future, they can produce items that are exclusively for people with sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: I wouldnt use this daily. Its definitely exfoliating and if you have sensitive skin, it might over irritate with too often of use. Some say it has a bad smell, but if you've used stuff like this before than you'll be used to products not smelling the greatest and it will seem fine. I just smell more like a "clay" smell, which is probably coming from the ash in the product. Overall, for myself personally, I felt like it was over rated and expected more from a product that had almost 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Carly McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Hey Gals - this stuff works for us too!!
customer_reviews.text: Female here. This line is quickly becoming a go to for me. I use this as second step wash in the AM - because it cannot get in your eyes. It gently and effectively sloughs my skin leaving me smooth and prepped. I have combo/acne 40+ skin and it has been a dreamy product for me. I notice a difference in my makeup application and also in my AM product absorption. I do not scrub hard - just gentle circular motions on my still slightly wet face.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great daily cleanser - worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I'm not much for cosmetics or fancy toiletries, but tried a small tube of this when my wife wanted to get some exfoliating masks at some store in the mall. Let me tell you, this stuff delivers. It works great as a daily facial cleanser, and I'll occasionally use it as a mask per the directions and after that my face has never felt (and looked) better. When that tube finally ran out, I picked up a bigger tube of it here on Amazon. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Ruth

customer_reviews.title: it is AMAZING. I'm not being paid to say this or ...
customer_reviews.text: I've never written a review on amazon before but this facewash has literally changed my skin from a lot of breakouts to not one pimple. it is AMAZING. I'm not being paid to say this or anything, I just wanted to write this so everyone knows how amazing it is and how much of a change it'll make in your skin. BUY THIS I KNOW IT"S EXPENSIVE BUT ITS SO WORTH IT.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth soll

customer_reviews.title: Great for pores
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I struggled with acne for about 15 years and went through dozens of cleansers, exfoliants, prescriptions (including accutane) and never found something that worked consistently until now. My skin has completely cleared up with this product. No clogged pores, no oily skin, no blackheads! Works great as a scrub and also as a mask and I’m able to comfortably use it everyday without feeling like it’s rough on my skin. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Melnick

customer_reviews.title: Good facial cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This is the second tube of this Jack Black product I have purchased, and I use it 3-4 times per week. I have used this as a face cleanser. I have not tried it as a mask, although it is advertised as being able to be used as such. In general, I'm happy with it. There really isn't much of a scent other than the mild clay smell that you'd expect. It doesn't seem to dry my skin out very much, but my skin is naturally on the oily side.
customer_reviews.author: Josh W.

customer_reviews.title: WATERED DOWN FAKE PRODUCT FROM A DIVERTER- BEWARE.
customer_reviews.text: I should have known better. This product is sold by a diverter who opened the product and then filled half of it with water. I've bought from an actual retailer and love this product but this isn't a legit straight from the brand buy. If you don't know what a diverter is- I suggest you look into it. You're paying the same price for a product that isn't guaranteed by the brand and is filled with water or something worse. Sometimes the products or old and used and refilled with water to be sold to you. Such a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: As an exfoliant, I am not impressed with this product. It is a grey color and seems to be composed of mostly ash. It has a very smooth texture and therefore, does not seem to do a great job of removing stuff from your face. I do not particularly like the smell of this product, and it is a just a bit more difficult to rinse off your face than other products. All in all, I will not be buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Best combo wash and mask I've used yet
customer_reviews.text: Best combo wash and mask I've used yet. After reading all the reviews I have to admit that this is the only mask product I will use from now on for my oily skin. I use it as a mask twice a week. Skin looks and feels like new. In my opinion for the price best stuff on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Brown

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: I use this brand of product for moisturizing my skin, so thought I would try this cleanser. Being a guy, I didn't think much of facial products. Usually just use the soap in the shower. But I started noticing my skin looking dull and thought I should try to improve my skin care routine. I started using this cleanser and have noticed an improvement in my skin within the first week, and no irritations. I'm going to continue to use this instead of bar soap.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Be careful using it as a mask
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful face wash! Be sure to use a moisturizer afterwards - it does a good job of cleaning everything from your face. I would caution people with sensitive skin against using this as a face mask - I found it had a slight burning sensation after 2 minutes and had to wash it off. But works as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Thompson H.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful clean, leaves skin soft
customer_reviews.text: My face always feels so clean and soft after using this stuff. I use a different daily cleanser, but once a month or so, I get a good deep clean with this mask. Feels a little harsh for daily use, but once in a while it feels great.
customer_reviews.author: AndrewTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Good as a mask but not as a daily cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great mask for the price. My skin always feels smooth and much less oily after using this. I did find out that using this daily would clog my pores around my nose. Overall it does the job for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Liddy

customer_reviews.title: Really deep cleansing.
customer_reviews.text: The best mildly abrasive facial cleaner I have ever used. Really does clean deeply and leaves your skin refreshed. I use it at night and often in the morning before shaving and it really prepares my face for a shave (with a blade razor).
customer_reviews.author: Mark B. Rohrer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing face wash without the annoying teenage cologne smell.
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this brand and product with a free sample and after only 2-3 uses I immediately ordered the full size. This face wash leaves my face feeling clean without any residue or powerful smell.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Really great face cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Really great face cleanser. I used to use a different glycolic cleanser but I want one a little more exfoliating and this is perfect. It does dry my face out a little but I just apply lotion right after I shower and it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Best facial cleanser I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best facial cleanser I've ever used. It is gentle and can be used daily. My oily skin always feels perfect after using it. I've gotten lots of compliments since using this. I use it in conjunction with the Face Buff Scrub a few times a week. The perfect combo. I used Proactiv for a really long time and then switched to this. The ingredients seem way better and the results are even better. I get compliments on my skin often, and it's definitely in large part due to these JACK BLACK products.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great First Use Feel
customer_reviews.text: Used as pre-shower mask. Let dry for 5 minutes then rinsed in shower. Post-shower face shave felt VERY close. Skin responded well - looking forward to next use & folow-up shave
customer_reviews.author: Idaho

customer_reviews.title: Jack Black is hilarious but also has good skin. Maybe this is why.
customer_reviews.text: Gets the grit and crud out of my facial pores. I have a tendency to get filthy when I work. This is a great alternative to breaking out with zits and blackheads. Get it.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Parker

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but I have to for this one. This product is a lifesaver. I've been struggling with acne for 15 years now. I started using this as a mask 4-5 times a week. After the first week, my skin was worse, but I kept using it thinking my skin had to get worse before it got better and I was right. I dont have a single blemish on my face today and it is solely because of this product. I use the moisturizer after each use, as well. Buying another tube today!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Christian

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash I've tried in a long time
customer_reviews.text: One of favorite face washes I've ever used. Feel like it actually is cleaning without drying out my skin too much and it actually feels really soothing on the skin. I'm super impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Rickie

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Based on the fact that I love Jack Black Hand Cream, I thought I'd try the face cleanser -- big mistake. This is very expensive soap, and nothing more. After weeks of use, I haven't noticed any difference in my skin. So I might as well go back to regular soap. Truly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Riehm

customer_reviews.title: Bad Caps
customer_reviews.text: The caps keep breaking on Jack Black products. I would think that if you pay $25 to $30 for a face wash that the packaging would be superior. I have had several of these caps break...causing the product to be wasted.
customer_reviews.author: jose2000

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Been using this stuff for >2 months. Seems to be the only stuff that keeps me from breaking out. giving my face that fresh clean feel afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Jin

customer_reviews.title: a-ok
customer_reviews.text: This product was referred to me by a friend and it is amazing my face feels so much smoother, I was told im always supose to wear sun block and this actually has sunblock in it
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Great facial product
customer_reviews.text: I use a few different JB facial cleansers and this one is especially good. I use it as a cleanser as well as a mask. It actually smells like clay so if that bothers you don’t get this!
customer_reviews.author: RAB

customer_reviews.title: Great daily face cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Really like jack black product. This daily face cleanser/mask is good. It leaves face clean and doesn't over dry out face. I definitely have to use a moisturizer after, but that's expected. Good product
customer_reviews.author: Emac

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great product. I haven't used it as a mask, only as a daily wash a few times a week, but I'm really happy with the results. The product is gentle, not a gritty exfoliant, and there is no unpleasant odor. Non drying, and is helping clear up acne. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: A. L.

customer_reviews.title: Cant speak to the science, but it has me ...
customer_reviews.text: Cant speak to the science, but it has me thoroughly convinced it does something. Acne around my mouth is mostly cleared up with regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: On my 2nd canister
customer_reviews.text: On my 2nd unit of this product. Good price and lasts quite a long time. I did try the mask feature once and it seemed to really dry my face out, but that could be the purpose. IDK. My face is clearer and less oily. I'm not entirely crediting this product, but people say I definitely dont look my age.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash
customer_reviews.text: Great for gentle exfoliating. Leaves my skin soft and clean. It's more expensive than what I would usually spend on face wash, but i haven't found anything that gives the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary G

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but unfortunately it arrived with the cover broken. As a result the product constantly leaks out.
customer_reviews.author: J Paige Freeland

customer_reviews.title: This does the job in removing everything from your skin ...
customer_reviews.text: This does the job in removing everything from your skin. I found it a little difficult to get off though, so I've been putting in on before my shower.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Leaves the skin feeling smooth and clean
customer_reviews.text: So far so good...makes skin feel soft and smooth. Great for using prior to shaving
customer_reviews.author: Mister

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as intended
customer_reviews.text: This is my first review as I never thought anything was ever that good or bad based on what I order. While this product is not that expensive, I have seen no value in it. Skin is actually worse as there is no difference in acne and the only thing noticeable is that my skin is drier. So a net loss. Not a good product
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: I like this product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product. Not sure how effective it is, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Hshmoney

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: First time to try Jack Black. This product has no enough foam. I can hardly see the clean effect. I have to use much more amount to wash my face, and as a result, it is used up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Zheng

customer_reviews.title: It Does make a different
customer_reviews.text: Not a big fan of facial cleanser/scrubs - but this product does make your skin feel clean and fresh. You can tell the difference right after rinsing it. Not aggressive to the skin, just perfect! Very very happy with it. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, seems to work well and does leave my face feeling clean. Only thing I wish, is that it smelled a little better. It does smell like clay, which isn't bad, but a hint of fragrance would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: blue10speed

customer_reviews.title: Keep it clean
customer_reviews.text: Slightly abrasive to scrub your face, but no micro beads to pollute the environment. Works great as a daily face wash.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Liyeos

customer_reviews.title: Happy Face, Clean Pores.
customer_reviews.text: 52 and still have acne. Dang. I use this stuff in the shower and it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitri Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Tampered With
customer_reviews.text: I buy this face wash all the time. The product i received did not have a safety seal on it and the product itself is runny as if it is diluted with water. This face wash is usually thicker than the product I received.
customer_reviews.author: jaleesa lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great facial cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I use JB products and I like this cleaners. I use it and the All in one wash in the shower. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: gyokuro

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works great! I use it 2-3 times a week and ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great! I use it 2-3 times a week and my face is oil free without being too dry.
customer_reviews.author: mtodde

customer_reviews.title: It's ok...
customer_reviews.text: ...but all these Jack Black products are overpriced! I won't be buying anymore because they just aren't worth the high price.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Baumeister

customer_reviews.title: Clean is good.
customer_reviews.text: Feels good as my expected. First time try this brand and had a good experience.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Leaves face dry, use once every 2-3 days not everyday
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: I FREAKIKG LOVE THIS PRODUCT. Helps get rid of my acne/ingrown-hairs. This stuff is so good - don’t get it in your eye tho, burns like a B.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Tauteoli

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use it each night, and it doesn't take much. Should last several months.
customer_reviews.author: Ross E. Dryer

customer_reviews.title: Its awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Gentle enough that it doesnt dry your face out and tough enough that I havent had a blemish since i started using it about 5 weeks ago. Best face scrub ive ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I noticed this dried out my face upon 2x a day usage, and made my acne break out again. Previously, I was using Jack Black's traditional face cleanser. Try it out for yourself, but make sure you assess if it works for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Lua

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: I like the texture of the cleanser, it's neither creamy or like a scrub. Perfect enough to not irritate your skin, all while removing the dirt from pores.
customer_reviews.author: kal

customer_reviews.title: Mask too
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend loves it! He uses it as a mask too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: My face feels super clean after. I like using this.
customer_reviews.author: MJB

customer_reviews.title: Good, just expensive
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the best exfoliator I've ever used, just not sure its worth the pricey $20.
customer_reviews.author: William Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Works alright..
customer_reviews.text: I'm about a week into using this stuff and it's been working okay. Not perfect, but it hasn't dried out my skin or burned me. It smells pretty clay..ie? Is that a word? I still feel weird using something endorsed by Jack Black...
customer_reviews.author: Sean Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: This has been an extremely good facial cleanser for me. The quality has been great and it leaves your face clean smooth and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Priyank Deshmukh

customer_reviews.title: Burns
customer_reviews.text: It burned my face and turned it red and splotchy.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Healthy ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I use it in the shower as a cleanser and shave cream combined.
customer_reviews.author: M. K. Solberg

customer_reviews.title: It kept my face somewhat clear, but did not ...
customer_reviews.text: It kept my face somewhat clear, but did not work as well as the reviews said it would, still breaking out

customer_reviews.title: Allergy reaction
customer_reviews.text: My face started having rash after a few times of using it. Had to throw it.
customer_reviews.author: MatX

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff. better than the daily facial cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Makes my face look refreshed and bright. Great scent too!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for my skin. I use it daily (even as a mask) and the condition of my skin has improved tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a solid face cleaners but I haven't noticed anything special about it.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Great facial scrub, deep clean
customer_reviews.text: Jack black facial products are rock solid and this is one of my favorites. Its a nice scrub that has done wonders for my skin. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua R

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I like to use as a masks cleans well and feels good
customer_reviews.author: Eric M. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: I love this i have been using it for a month ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this i have been using it for a month now and im starting to notice a difference i use it every other day and 1 day a week as a mask. leaves skin feeling smooth.
customer_reviews.author: mayra donan

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: Good for my oily acne prone skin. Have been using for years.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Bornstein

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but there are other jack black products that work better
customer_reviews.text: Cleans the skin of the face without leaving it super dry. It is more expensive than it should be I think but the all natural ingredients help to justify the price. There really isnt a scent that smells clean and refreshing but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this! I'm allergic to almost everything and NOT ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I'm allergic to almost everything and NOT this. You can use as a mask or just a scrub. Slightly drying but you can just moisturize after
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: Good but $$$
customer_reviews.text: Good quality cleanser. I'm using it more as an occasional mask. Not convinced it is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: G P

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Cleanser & mask in 1, removes dead skin & cleans closed pores without causing any irritation even around the eye area. Will purchase again & again :)
customer_reviews.author: Zee H

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Second product by this company I've used. Happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Practical J

customer_reviews.title: Buy it youll love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a couple years and even the ladies love it as well!!..Keeps skin tight and clean!!
customer_reviews.author: JASON JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Pricy, but a good product
customer_reviews.text: My favorite face wash by far. Not sure exactly how ,UCB this does for the skin, but it sure does feel great. The girlfriend even stole one from my shower!
customer_reviews.author: cv

customer_reviews.title: ... then this might throw you off but it works great. You don't need a lot of product OR ...
customer_reviews.text: If you're use to a facial cleanser with microbeads then this might throw you off but it works great. You don't need a lot of product OR water to make this effective.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Bott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, it's just pretty expensive for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Don Draper

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I use it a couple times a week in the shower, makes my skin feels smoother and look clearer. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Dope cleanser!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is pretty dang good. It really helped with my oily skin and pore size reduction.
customer_reviews.author: Trey Munz

customer_reviews.title: Great skin!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! This is great because it can be used as a face mask or wash. It makes my skin feel soft and isn't clumpy or messy. Also, it's cruelty free which is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This products really changed my skin! I use it ...
customer_reviews.text: This products really changed my skin! I use it with the MIA2 and wow my face is so soft and smooth. I'm obsessed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this cleanser. My skin is pretty sensitive, and I'm prone to breakouts when trying new products, facing stress, eating too much sugar, etc etc etc. This cleanser really seems to calm that down! I love the clay-like texture and the way it feels on my face. My skin is pretty dry, as well, and daily use hasn't dried me out at all. I'll definitely purchasing again! This being said, I use this in conjunction with several other products. So I'm not sure how effective it would be without a decent skincare routine behind it.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Great product Very Disappointed with Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but I’m very disappointed. Amazon didn’t ship me my JB Deep Dive
customer_reviews.author: AmpeyFAM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have not had one breakout since starting to use this face cleanser!
customer_reviews.author: skillz1523

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to use with the face Buff for great results
customer_reviews.author: Osy

customer_reviews.title: Cleared my acne up
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for past 3 yrs and I love it! It can overdry the skin in the winter months if used to often
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I don't notice a difference in reduced oil. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Economises

customer_reviews.title: Terrific face wash
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cleanser - far better than soap. Skin looked better after just a few uses. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin, just make sure you use a moisturizer after washing your face
customer_reviews.text: So I have a few of their products and decided to try this after I got a sample and enjoyed it. This is a nice thick daily face wash and I have used it as a mask and does a great deep clean. It does make your skin feel tighter and a little dried out but that is what the daily moisturizer is for after you wash your face. I just made this part of my daily shower process and is easy to use. I have super sensitive skin and this works just fine with me which is surprising considering it is a little more gritty and coarse than previous face washes I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Murph

customer_reviews.title: Awesome face wash
customer_reviews.text: It's the best face wash that I ever used. It works so well
customer_reviews.author: Aziz B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for a quick mask, leaves your face feeling very clean
customer_reviews.author: Robby Nunn

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This has become my new favorite after my favorite mask (AcneFree's Sulfur Mask) was discontinued. Even if that product were back, I'd stick with this.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff, it leaves my skin soft and clean
customer_reviews.author: Julia C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this cleanser! Very simple but yet effective. A new staple for me ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Tina L Dare

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars. Absolutely love the product. Seriously one of the best facial cleaning products I've ever tried
customer_reviews.author: Will Downs

customer_reviews.title: I do like using it as a weekly mask
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin so for an everyday cleanser, this is too harsh. However, I do like using it as a weekly mask.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: This is a great face wash for both man and woman
customer_reviews.text: This is a great face wash for both man and woman. It gives you a nice deep clean and I love that it is made without parabens. I used to get this from Sephora, but it's easier to get it from Amazon. It doesn't come in a box (it never does, even at Sephora), but the mouth is sealed so you know the product has not been tampered with. Can't beat the price for a mid-end product either!
customer_reviews.author: SiliconValleyFamily

customer_reviews.title: I love the way it makes my face feel
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it makes my face feel...If you have oily type skin you will love it....have not tried it as a mask yet....I'm sure it will work even better though
customer_reviews.author: James Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good cleanser, but I don't think it's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Me

product_meta.title: Jack Black Deep Dive Glycolic Facial Cleanser, 3, 5 and 10 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Size:5 Ounce

Jack Black Deep Dive Glycolic Facial Cleanser is an exceptional multifunctional, clay-based cleanser that washes away dead skin cells, pore-clogging oil, and build-up. Consistent use of this two-in-one facial cleanser and mask leaves skin fresher, smoother, and firmer. The PureScience formula is recommended for normal, combination, and oily skin and is safe for sensitive skin. Jack Black PureScience formulas are free of synthetic fragrance, colorants, and parabens and include certified organic ingredients.

Jack Black Deep Dive Glycolic Facial Cleanser is packed with powerful certified organic ingredients that work together to exfoliate skin and leave skin smooth and firmer. Glycolic Acid is a highly effective chemical exfoliant that removes dead skin cell buildup for noticeably softer, firmer, and clearer skin. It also helps to prevent ingrown hairs. Volcanic Ash is included in the formula and boasts revitalizing antioxidants and natural particles that work as a gentle physical exfoliant to help smooth and resurface the skin. Kaolin Clay is a natural clay that draws out skin impurities, oil, and dirt and works to control oiliness due to its natural absorption properties.

All Jack Black products are carefully formulated with the finest ingredients to be highly effective, yet easy to use. Every Jack Black product is dermatologist tested, paraben free, cruelty free, and free of harsh surfactants. Almost all of the products in our line are vegan, free of artificial colorants, safe for sensitive skin, and made in the USA. Jack Black Deep Dive Glycolic Facial Cleanser can be used as a cleanser or mask. When used as a cleanser, apply a small amount to wet hands, work into a creamy lather, and apply to slightly damp face using a circular motion. Immediately rinse. To use as a mask, spread a small amount onto dry face and evenly apply using a circular motion, avoiding eye area and lips. Allow to dry approximately 5 minutes then rinse.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
